Sql.CDATA: IF EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM SYS.views WHERE name = 'v_InventoryAllocationDetais' AND SCHEMA_ID = SCHEMA_ID('dbo') ) DROP VIEW [dbo].[v_InventoryAllocationDetais] GO CREATE VIEW v_InventoryAllocationDetais AS select p.CompanyID, CASE WHEN t.InclQtyFSSrvOrdBooked = 1 THEN 'InclQtyFSSrvOrdBooked' WHEN t.InclQtyFSSrvOrdAllocated = 1 THEN 'InclQtyFSSrvOrdAllocated' WHEN t.InclQtyFSSrvOrdPrepared = 1 THEN 'InclQtyFSSrvOrdPrepared' WHEN t.InclQtySOBackOrdered = 1 THEN 'InclQtySOBackOrdered' WHEN t.InclQtySOPrepared = 1 THEN 'InclQtySOPrepared' WHEN t.InclQtySOBooked = 1 THEN 'InclQtySOBooked' WHEN t.InclQtySOShipped = 1 THEN 'InclQtySOShipped' WHEN t.InclQtySOShipping = 1 THEN 'InclQtySOShipping' WHEN t.InclQtyInTransit = 1 THEN 'InclQtyInTransit' WHEN t.InclQtyInTransitToSO = 1 THEN 'InclQtyInTransitToSO' WHEN t.InclQtyPOReceipts = 1 THEN 'InclQtyPOReceipts' WHEN t.InclQtyPOPrepared = 1 THEN 'InclQtyPOPrepared' WHEN t.InclQtyPOOrders = 1 THEN 'InclQtyPOOrders' WHEN t.InclQtyINIssues = 1 THEN 'InclQtyINIssues' WHEN t.InclQtyINReceipts = 1 THEN 'InclQtyINReceipts' WHEN t.InclQtyINAssemblyDemand = 1 THEN 'InclQtyINAssemblyDemand' WHEN t.InclQtyINAssemblySupply = 1 THEN 'InclQtyINAssemblySupply' WHEN t.InclQtyInTransitToProduction = 1 THEN 'InclQtyInTransitToProduction' WHEN t.InclQtyProductionSupplyPrepared = 1 THEN 'InclQtyProductionSupplyPrepared' WHEN t.InclQtyProductionSupply = 1 THEN 'InclQtyProductionSupply' WHEN t.InclQtyPOFixedProductionPrepared = 1 THEN 'InclQtyPOFixedProductionPrepared' WHEN t.InclQtyPOFixedProductionOrders = 1 THEN 'InclQtyPOFixedProductionOrders' WHEN t.InclQtyProductionDemandPrepared = 1 THEN 'InclQtyProductionDemandPrepared' WHEN t.InclQtyProductionDemand = 1 THEN 'InclQtyProductionDemand' WHEN t.InclQtyProductionAllocated = 1 THEN 'InclQtyProductionAllocated' WHEN t.InclQtySOFixedProduction = 1 THEN 'InclQtySOFixedProduction' WHEN t.InclQtyProdFixedPurchase = 1 THEN 'InclQtyProdFixedPurchase' WHEN t.InclQtyProdFixedProduction = 1 THEN 'InclQtyProdFixedProduction' WHEN t.InclQtyProdFixedProdOrdersPrepared = 1 THEN 'InclQtyProdFixedProdOrdersPrepared' WHEN t.InclQtyProdFixedProdOrders = 1 THEN 'InclQtyProdFixedProdOrders' WHEN t.InclQtyProdFixedSalesOrdersPrepared = 1 THEN 'InclQtyProdFixedSalesOrdersPrepared' WHEN t.InclQtyProdFixedSalesOrders = 1 THEN 'InclQtyProdFixedSalesOrders' WHEN t.InclQtyINReplaned = 1 THEN 'InclQtyINReplaned' WHEN t.InclQtyFixedFSSrvOrd = 1 THEN 'InclQtyFixedFSSrvOrd' WHEN t.InclQtyPOFixedFSSrvOrd = 1 THEN 'InclQtyPOFixedFSSrvOrd' WHEN t.InclQtyPOFixedFSSrvOrdPrepared = 1 THEN 'InclQtyPOFixedFSSrvOrdPrepared' WHEN t.InclQtyPOFixedFSSrvOrdReceipts = 1 THEN 'InclQtyPOFixedFSSrvOrdReceipts' WHEN t.InclQtySOFixed = 1 THEN 'InclQtySOFixed' WHEN t.InclQtyPOFixedOrders = 1 THEN 'InclQtyPOFixedOrders' WHEN t.InclQtyPOFixedPrepared = 1 THEN 'InclQtyPOFixedPrepared' WHEN t.InclQtyPOFixedReceipts = 1 THEN 'InclQtyPOFixedReceipts' WHEN t.InclQtySODropShip = 1 THEN 'InclQtySODropShip' WHEN t.InclQtyPODropShipOrders = 1 THEN 'InclQtyPODropShipOrders' WHEN t.InclQtyPODropShipPrepared = 1 THEN 'InclQtyPODropShipPrepared' WHEN t.InclQtyPODropShipReceipts = 1 THEN 'InclQtyPODropShipReceipts' ELSE 'Other' END AS AllocationType, CASE WHEN INAvailabilityScheme.InclQtyFSSrvOrdAllocated = 1 THEN 'InclQtyFSSrvOrdAllocated' WHEN INAvailabilityScheme.InclQtyFSSrvOrdBooked = 1 THEN 'InclQtyFSSrvOrdBooked' WHEN INAvailabilityScheme.InclQtyFSSrvOrdPrepared = 1 THEN 'InclQtyFSSrvOrdPrepared' WHEN INAvailabilityScheme.InclQtyINAssemblyDemand = 1 THEN 'InclQtyINAssemblyDemand' WHEN INAvailabilityScheme.InclQtyINAssemblySupply = 1 THEN 'InclQtyINAssemblySupply' WHEN INAvailabilityScheme.InclQtyINIssues = 1 THEN 'InclQtyINIssues' WHEN INAvailabilityScheme.InclQtyINReceipts = 1 THEN 'InclQtyINReceipts' WHEN INAvailabilityScheme.InclQtyInTransit = 1 THEN 'InclQtyInTransit' WHEN INAvailabilityScheme.InclQtyPOOrders = 1 THEN 'InclQtyPOOrders' WHEN INAvailabilityScheme.InclQtyPOPrepared = 1 THEN 'InclQtyPOPrepared' WHEN INAvailabilityScheme.InclQtyPOReceipts = 1 THEN 'InclQtyPOReceipts' WHEN INAvailabilityScheme.InclQtyProductionAllocated = 1 THEN 'InclQtyProductionAllocated' WHEN INAvailabilityScheme.InclQtyProductionDemand = 1 THEN 'InclQtyProductionDemand' WHEN INAvailabilityScheme.InclQtyProductionDemandPrepared = 1 THEN 'InclQtyProductionDemandPrepared' WHEN INAvailabilityScheme.InclQtyProductionSupply = 1 THEN 'InclQtyProductionSupply' WHEN INAvailabilityScheme.InclQtyProductionSupplyPrepared = 1 THEN 'InclQtyProductionSupplyPrepared' WHEN INAvailabilityScheme.InclQtySOBackOrdered = 1 THEN 'InclQtySOBackOrdered' WHEN INAvailabilityScheme.InclQtySOBooked = 1 THEN 'InclQtySOBooked' WHEN INAvailabilityScheme.InclQtySOPrepared = 1 THEN 'InclQtySOPrepared' WHEN INAvailabilityScheme.InclQtySOReverse = 1 THEN 'InclQtySOReverse' WHEN INAvailabilityScheme.InclQtySOShipped = 1 THEN 'InclQtySOShipped' WHEN INAvailabilityScheme.InclQtySOShipping = 1 THEN 'InclQtySOShipping' ELSE 'Other' END AS CalculateRule, p.PlanDate AS Date, p.InventoryID, p.SiteID, p.PlanQty AS Qty from INItemPlan p inner join INPlanType t on p.PlanType = t.PlanType left join INLocation loc on p.LocationID = loc.LocationID and p.CompanyID = loc.CompanyID left join INLotSerialStatus on p.CompanyID = INLotSerialStatus.CompanyID and p.LotSerialNbr = INLotSerialStatus.LotSerialNbr left join BAccount on p.CompanyID = BAccount.CompanyID and p.BAccountID = BAccount.BAccountID left join INSubItem on p.CompanyID = INSubItem.CompanyID and p.SubItemID = INSubItem.SubItemID inner join INSite on p.CompanyID = INSite.CompanyID and p.SiteID = INSite.SiteID left join SOShipment on p.CompanyID = SOShipment.CompanyID and p.RefNoteID = SOShipment.NoteID left join ARRegister on p.CompanyID = ARRegister.CompanyID and p.RefNoteID = ARRegister.NoteID left join INRegister on p.CompanyID = INRegister.CompanyID and p.RefNoteID = INRegister.NoteID left join SOOrder on p.CompanyID = SOOrder.CompanyID and p.RefNoteID = SOOrder.NoteID left join POOrder on p.CompanyID = POOrder.CompanyID and p.RefNoteID = POOrder.NoteID left join POReceipt on p.CompanyID = POReceipt.CompanyID and p.RefNoteID = POReceipt.NoteID left join INTransitLine on p.CompanyID = INTransitLine.CompanyID and p.RefNoteID = INTransitLine.NoteID inner join InventoryItem on p.CompanyID = InventoryItem.CompanyID and p.InventoryID = InventoryItem.InventoryID inner join INItemClass on p.CompanyID = INItemClass.CompanyID and InventoryItem.ItemClassID = INItemClass.ItemClassID inner join INAvailabilityScheme on p.CompanyID = INAvailabilityScheme.CompanyID and INItemClass.AvailabilitySchemeID = INAvailabilityScheme.AvailabilitySchemeID where p.PlanQty != 0 --order by Insubitem.SubItemCD,INSite.SiteCD,p.OrigPlanType,p.PlanType,loc.LocationCD
